docs.lead_paragraph: Despite the fierce sound of Islamic revolution in Iran and coups in Afghanistan, the fact remains that the lives of people in third-world countries are frequently improved by such changes.
docs.abstract: Pat Orvis article on political upheavals in Third World nations holds lives of people in underdeveloped and developing nations are frequently improved by such changes; says US should supported programs that help Third-World poor to help themselves rather than offering handouts
docs.snippet: Despite the fierce sound of Islamic revolution in Iran and coups in Afghanistan, the fact remains that the lives of people in third-world countries are frequently improved by such changes.
